sentences.sContent: That will work as a tourniquet.
sentences.sCn: 就和止血带的功用一样了。

sentences.sContent: Still, it remains to be seen whether the tourniquet will hold. Even after the new plan, Greece will have a staggering load of debt.
sentences.sContent_eng: Still, it remains to be seen whether the tourniquet will hold. Even after the new plan, Greece will have a staggering load of debt.
sentences.sCn: 然而止血带能否承受压力尚待分晓。即使新计划得以实施，希腊仍将面临巨额债务负担。

sentences.sContent: This tourniquet is tight. How does it feel?
sentences.sContent_eng: This tourniquet is tight. How does it feel?
sentences.sCn: 好了，止血带紧了，觉得怎样？

trans.tranOther: a band of cloth that is twisted tightly around an injured arm or leg to stop it bleeding
